components.onError:
var errorMessage =response.data.errors? response.data.errors.errorMessage: null;if (errorMessage && errorMessage.indexOf("ORA-20000") > -1) {  alert("An entry already exists for this virtual domain and role, cannot add a duplicate", {type:"error"});} else {   alert( errorMessage?errorMessage:response.data, {type:"error"});};
$("input[id^='pbid-ActionItemStatusAgree-radio']").prop('disabled', false);
